author: schmendrick
title: This house is on fire
review:
The best part of this set seems to be the tube. My 2 year old son loves to let the dog go down the tube over and over again. Another highlight in the kids room is the helicopter which can hold two minifigs.

Assembling:
Easy. The manual is clearly and the construction consists only of columns and two house fronts.

Bright side of the moon:
+ Yellow tube (3 elements, moveable)
+ Helicopter
+ 2 road base plates
+ clever design of Window- and Door-elements (slips out of the mounting easily and therefore doesn't break)

Dark side of the moon:
- Clumsy construction

Additional stuff:
You better build this station upon basic plates or connect the road-parts with some flat bricks. Otherwise you will have to rebuild it more often, than my son pushes the dog through the tube :) The trailer made an awful squeeky noise out of the box. I fixed that with silicone spray. Ahhh... and we took away that evil siren. The WeoWeoWeoWeo-Noise made us nearly insane.
